# portkey_integrations (Data Source)

Fetches all Portkey integrations in the organization.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `integrations` (Attributes List) List of integrations. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--integrations))

<a id="nestedatt--integrations"></a>
### Nested Schema for `integrations`

Read-Only:

- `ai_provider_id` (String) ID of the AI provider.
- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the integration was created.
- `description` (String) Description of the integration.
- `id` (String) Integration UUID.
- `name` (String) Human-readable name of the integration.
- `slug` (String) Integration slug identifier.
- `status` (String) Status of the integration.
- `updated_at` (String) Timestamp when the integration was last updated.
